name: blog-x
description: Blog-X - Modern blogging platform with Next.js and NestJS

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ..
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
